arts.ttl: “Proud of My Boys”: Palladino Reflects on Fiorentina’s Loss to Inter
arts.sum: Fiorentina coach Raffaele Palladino reflected on his team's 2-1 loss to Inter Milan in a post-match interview with DAZN, expressing both pride and regret. Despite the defeat, Palladino stood by his decisions, emphasizing the meritocracy within his squad. The post “Proud of My Boys”: Palladino Reflects on Fiorentina’s Loss to Inter appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Serie A | Inter 2-1 Fiorentina: Match Report
arts.sum: Inter Milan secured a crucial 2-1 victory against Fiorentina at San Siro, avenging their recent 3-0 defeat in Tuscany. The match, which took place just days after their previous encounter, saw Inter bounce back with a strong performance. The post Serie A | Inter 2-1 Fiorentina: Match Report appeared first on FootItalia.com.
